body:
I suspect this is due to Travis running slowly -- currently lock tests rely on a 1m timeout.  Recording it here for posterity in case it was not transient slowness in the cloud.

FWIW, tests for the merged commit succeeded in the PR, and this only occurred for one of the tests cases after the merge to develop.

[Link to build # 4750](https://travis-ci.org/LLNL/spack/builds/170539111)

title: Lock error in `develop` build
